name: .PC7 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PC7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: CAD drawing created with PowerCADD 7, a Macintosh-only architecture and design program; may contain building designs and layouts, machinery designs, or 2D drawings.

content: NOTE: PowerCADD may not add the ".pc7" file extension by default, but it may be added by the user.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
